img_summary: The image displays the equipment menu from a video game, focusing on a rare item called "Verdant Glow." This item has a high Qi cost and allows the player to take the form of a tree, absorbing the essence of nature to continuously recover health, with enhanced effects when in water. The equipped effect slowly recovers a small amount of health. The menu shows various spirits available for selection, each represented by an icon. The player's level is 102, with detailed basic attributes such as health, mana, stamina, attack, and defense displayed on the right side. Additionally, there are resistances to different types of damage, including chill, burn, poison, and shock.
